taskFlows.taskFlowDescription: A structured approach to plan every essential detail of a trip to the destination.

input.text: I want to travel to Paris in June

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Choose optimal travel dates considering weather, local events, and personal availability.

pattern.name: Single Agent
pattern.description: This design pattern has a single agent to perform the task, and have access to the web search tool to search for information. It is useful when the task requires the agent to search for information on the web.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Research and compare hotels, Airbnb, hostels, or other lodging options.

pattern.name: Parallel
pattern.description: Work simultaneously on a task and have their outputs aggregated programmatically. It is useful when the task has several focus points, and each focus point can be handled by a different worker agent.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Create a day-to-day itinerary including sightseeing, dining, and local experiences.

pattern.name: Discussion
pattern.description: This design pattern has multiple agents with different personas and roles, and they can debate, randomly discuss to generate diverse ideas, voting, brainstorming, and generating diverse perspectives. It is useful when the task requires creativity and diversity of perspectives.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Decide on flights, local transportation passes, car rentals, and other logistics.

pattern.name: Reflection
pattern.description: This design pattern has a pair of agents, one is the main agent, and the other is the reflection agent. The main agent performs the task, and the reflection agent observes and provides iterative feedback to improve performance.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Estimate costs and manage expenses effectively.

pattern.name: Supervision
pattern.description: A supervisor agent coordinates multiple specialized worker agents.

taskFlows.taskFlowDescription: Focused exploration of the destination's renowned museums, galleries, and music venues.

input.text: I want to travel to Vienna in December

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Identify and prioritize must-visit museums and art galleries in the destination.

pattern.name: Single Agent
pattern.description: Agent uses web searches to identify key cultural venues.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Organize and schedule visits to selected museums and exhibitions.

pattern.name: Single Agent
pattern.description: Single agent efficiently handles scheduling tasks.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Research and select music concerts, operas, and performances.

pattern.name: Parallel
pattern.description: Agents simultaneously research diverse musical events.

taskFlowSteps.stepDescription: Ensure all bookings and plans align with personal interests and schedules.

pattern.name: Validator
pattern.description: Evaluator agent confirms all planned activities match user preferences.
